Name:                     redis-cart
Namespace:                boutique
Labels:                   app=redis-cart
Annotations:              <none>
Selector:                 application=redis-cart
Type:                     ClusterIP
IP Family Policy:         SingleStack
IP Families:              IPv4
IP:                       10.68.22.96
IPs:                      10.68.22.96
Port:                     tcp-redis  6379/TCP
TargetPort:               6379/TCP
Endpoints:                
Session Affinity:         None
Internal Traffic Policy:  Cluster
Events:                   <none>

apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: redis-cart-pv
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 1Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: ""
  hostPath:
    path: "/mnt/data"
    type: DirectoryOrCreate
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: redis-cart-pvc
  namespace: boutique
spec:
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi
  storageClassName: ""
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-cart
  namespace: boutique
  labels:
    app: redis-cart
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-cart
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis-cart
    spec:
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      containers:
      - name: redis
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
              - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        image: redis:alpine
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 6379
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: redis-data
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 125m
          requests:
            cpu: 70m
            memory: 200Mi
      volumes:
      - name: redis-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: redis-cart-pvc
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: redis-cart
  namespace: boutique
  labels:
    app: redis-cart
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  selector:
    application: redis-cart
  ports:
  - name: tcp-redis
    port: 6379
    targetPort: 6379
